segments.text: Good morning , sir . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , thank you . I want to get a handbag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want it for yourself or for your girlfriend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please excuse me for what I said just now . What do you think of this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am afraid it is too big .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry . It is the smallest size we have .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Too bad . But , is there any other leather store nearby ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . There is a big one at the right corner of the street . Perhaps you will get one there .
segments.speaker: S1
